description: Did you know jalapeos are native to Central Mexico? Their fiery flavor adds a spicy kick to today's Jalapeo tortilla chips.
Savor tropical sweetness and zesty hibiscus notes, wrapped in a crispy potato shell. Celebrating National Day with flavors of Saint Lucia's culinary heritage.
Today, savor the luxurious blend of buttery Chardonnay and earthy white truffles in each crispy bite. A toast to flavor, celebrating today's culinary delights.
Did you know Indiana is the nation's top producer of popcorn? Today we celebrate Indiana Corn, which combines the state's famous crop with crispy chip perfection.

Did you know that the cultivation of olives dates back to ancient Greece? Today's chip is infused with authentic Greek olive oil, carrying centuries of culinary tradition and the rich flavors of the Mediterranean.

Did you know Mexican Street Corn is inspired by elote, the traditional corn on the cob topped with chili powder, mayo, cotija cheese, and lime juice? Today's Chip of the Day captures this vibrant stre...
Did you know that Bodhi chips are inspired by Bodhi Day and the sacred Bodhi Tree? Originating in ancient India, this tree holds deep spiritual significance.
Did you know Arepas are traditional Colombian flatbreads made from cornmeal? These crispy delights showcase the vibrant flavors of Colombia's culinary heritage.
Did you know lemons are native to Asia but now thrive worldwide? Their tangy zest adds zing to today's potato chips, echoing the citrus notes found in traditional Ecuadorian ceviche.

Did you know that the term 'crispy' originates from ancient cooking techniques used to achieve a perfect crunch? Today's Crispy potato chip celebrates this culinary artistry, offering a satisfying snap in every bite.
Did you know Korean BBQ isn't just about meat? Today's chip combines the flavors of marinated beef, sweet soy sauce, and savory garlic, giving a taste of Korea's vibrant culinary scene.
Did you know the Coptic potato chip is inspired by Pope Abraham of Alexandria (6 Koiak)? Born today, this ancient leader connects us to Egypt's rich Christian heritage through its distinct flavor.
Did you know that the flavors of Cuba Libre's potato chips are inspired by the vibrant culture and history of Cuba? Each crisp bite is a journey through traditional Cuban spices and ingredients.
Did you know dill is native to Europe and Asia? Its crisp, fresh flavor now adds a unique twist to today's Russian-themed potato chips, celebrating the spirit of Battle of the Sinop Day.
Did you know Jerk seasoning is inspired by the spicy flavors of Barbados cuisine? Today's Chip of the Day brings bold Jamaican flavor to your snack, connecting you to Caribbean culinary heritage.
Did you know that Italy's rich culinary tradition inspired our Italian Herb Cheese chip flavor? Savory cheese meets fragrant herbs, reflecting centuries of Mediterranean gastronomic heritage.

Did you know that Bukovina is known for Mmlig, Romania's beloved cornmeal porridge? Today's Bukovina potato chips celebrate this cherished tradition by combining crispy potato crunch with the rich fla...
